text: Stefanie Hubig (; born 15 December 1968) is a German politician of the Social Democratic Party (SPD). She has been the State Minister for Education in the government of Minister-President of Rhineland-Palatinate Malu Dreyer since 2016.Timo Frasch (11 May 2016), Ampel in Rheinland-Pfalz: Neue Minister f√ºr Dreyers Kabinett Frankfurter Allgemeine Zeitung. In 2025, she was selected as the Minister of Justice and Consumer Protection in a new Merz cabinet. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Frankfurt Category:Justice ministers of Germany Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany
title: Stefanie Hubig
